channel.title: CVE Feed for HyperView -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HyperView -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-6450|2024-09-06T12:48:48.832Z -- hyperview -- geoportal%20toolkit
item.description: HyperView Geoportal Toolkit in versions lower than 8.5.0 is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS). An unauthenticated attacker might trick somebody into using a crafted URL, which will cause a script to be run in user's browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-6449|2024-09-06T12:24:52.307Z -- hyperview -- geoportal%20toolkit
item.description: HyperView Geoportal Toolkit in versions lower than 8.5.0 does not restrict cross-domain requests when fetching remote content pointed by one of GET request parameters. An unauthenticated remote attacker can prepare links, which upon opening will load scripts from a remote location controlled by the attacker and execute them in the user space. By manipulating this parameter it is also possible to enumerate some of the devices in Local Area Network in which the server resides.

item.title: CVE-2024-6449|2024-08-28T11:49:42.295Z -- hyperview -- geoportal%20toolkit
item.description: HyperView Geoportal Toolkit in versions though 8.2.4 does not restrict cross-domain requests when fetching remote content pointed by one of GET request parameters. An unauthenticated remote attacker can prepare links, which upon opening will load scripts from a remote location controlled by the attacker and execute them in the user space. By manipulating this parameter it is also possible to enumerate some of the devices in Local Area Network in which the server resides.
